name: Sera
appearance: Broad-hipped dwarf with a perpetual dust-veil around her neck, slate-gray eyes, and callused hands stained with blue grit. Wears a belt of tuning hammers.
character: Shrewd and steady negotiator; treats stone, crews, and coin with the same measured respect.
talents: senses hollow seams by vibration through boots
memorizes tunnel maps after one walk
dreams: shift taxes from weight to finished value
open a seam beneath the bay without flooding a single lantern
secrets: maintains a forbidden shaft trending toward the Diadem foundations
pays Blue Fist stipends during ‘accidental’ stoppages
has a private stash of Ledger notes to burn if seized
